title: How is everyone so bad at this game?
body: I don't even play anymore and I still carry scrubs in diamond. How do people who no life LoL still suck so badly?

replies.body:
Yeah that noob Faker, who can only carry with Ryze
*Full Sarcasm.
you forgot his passive which gives him a shield and his ult which gives more buffs and you missed a few w's

Okay, two things wrong here:
1) Ryze W is a stare not a stun.
2) it is a single target stare.

P.S. Are you like Bronze or Silver?
R then W snare the whole enemy team :). aka Keyboard Warrior or Face roll king
You do realize Ryze stare has a cool-down it may not be high but it is enough for an opponent to escape if he is faster then Ryze.
The real question is why wouldn't you no life LoL and become the greatest player who ever lived?

They don't have anyone at the top level who understands the game well enough to evolve their gameplay passed the basics. So everyone underneath kinda just follows suit and another problem with that is that anyone below them who tries to say hey look this is 10 times better just gets laughed at and trolled.

Welcome to society sir!
